trans-unit.source: Represents the parameters for supporting security tokens required by the security binding element.
trans-unit.target: 表示安全绑定元素所要求的支持安全令牌的参数。

trans-unit.source: This class is a collection of token properties and methods, and is used in creating security binding elements and tokens.
trans-unit.target: 此类是令牌属性和方法的集合，并可用于创建安全绑定元素和令牌。

trans-unit.source: Supporting tokens specify encryption and signing requirements.
trans-unit.target: 支持令牌指定加密和签名要求。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The new instance property values are set to their defaults:
trans-unit.target: 将新实例属性值设置为各自的默认值：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.InclusionMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenInclusionMode.AlwaysToRecipient>.
trans-unit.target: 将 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.InclusionMode%2A> 设置为 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenInclusionMode.AlwaysToRecipient>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.ReferenceStyle%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenReferenceStyle.Internal>.
trans-unit.target: 将 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.ReferenceStyle%2A> 设置为 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenReferenceStyle.Internal>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.RequireDerivedKeys%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 将 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.RequireDerivedKeys%2A> 设置为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: Clones another instance of this instance of the class.
trans-unit.target: 为该类的实例克隆另一个实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters" />。

trans-unit.source: Clones another instance of this instance of the class.
trans-unit.target: 为该类的实例克隆另一个实例。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters" /> 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of security token parameters for endorsing supporting tokens required by the security binding element.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个安全令牌参数的集合，该集合用于认可安全绑定元素所要求的支持令牌。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters" /> 的集合。

trans-unit.source: Endorsing tokens sign the message signature.
trans-unit.target: 认可令牌为消息签名进行签名。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> that determines whether parameters require derived keys.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />，确定参数是否需要派生密钥。

trans-unit.source: Sets a value that indicates whether all endorsing or signed endorsing token parameters require derived keys.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个值，该值指示是否所有认可或签名的认可令牌参数都需要派生密钥。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters> in <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters.Endorsing%2A> or in <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters.SignedEndorsing%2A> has its <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.RequireDerivedKeys%2A> property set to `requireDerivedKeys`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters> 或 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters.Endorsing%2A> 中的每个 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters.SignedEndorsing%2A> 都将其 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters.RequireDerivedKeys%2A> 属性设置为 `requireDerivedKeys`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of security token parameters for signed supporting tokens required by the security binding element.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个安全令牌参数的集合，用于安全绑定元素所要求的已签名的支持令牌。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters" /> 的集合。

trans-unit.source: Signed tokens are included in the message signature.
trans-unit.target: 签名的令牌包含在消息签名中。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of security token parameters for signed and encrypted supporting tokens required by the security binding element.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个安全令牌参数的集合，用于安全绑定元素所要求的已签名且加密的支持令牌。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters" /> 的集合。

trans-unit.source: Signed tokens are included in the message signature and are encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 签名的令牌包含在消息签名中且已加密。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of security token parameters for signed and endorsing supporting tokens required by the security binding element.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个安全令牌参数的集合，用于安全绑定元素所要求的已签名且认可的支持令牌。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters" /> 的集合。

trans-unit.source: Signed endorsing tokens sign the message signature token and are themselves signed by the message signature.
trans-unit.target: 签名的认可令牌为消息签名令牌签名，而其自身则由消息签名来签名。

trans-unit.source: Displays a text representation of this instance of the class.
trans-unit.target: 显示该类实例的文本表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A text representation of this instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 该类实例的文本表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The output string displays the result of performing the `ToString()` method on each of the tokens in <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters.Endorsing%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters.Signed%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters.SignedEncrypted%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters.SignedEndorsing%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 输出字符串显示在 `ToString()`、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters.Endorsing%2A>、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters.Signed%2A> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters.SignedEncrypted%2A> 的每个令牌上执行 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SupportingTokenParameters.SignedEndorsing%2A> 方法的结果。
